title: Hire a new balance team
body:
Preseason is long gone and the game is progressively getting worse. Time to hire a balance team with people who actually play the game and have a more objective point of view than the current one. Let the old one make skins. 

Tired of getting auto attacked to death by ADCs. We've had to shit for several years straight, and nothing's being done.

replies.body: ...So what, should ADCs not do damage then?
Their damage needs to be conditional. Why should they instantly unlock their full damage by right clicking when other classes have to hit key abilities or be in melee range to dish out damage?

> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZbdyTbyA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-08T02:47:15.312+0000)
>
> Their damage needs to be conditional. Why should they instantly unlock their full damage by right clicking when other classes have to hit key abilities or be in melee range to dish out damage?

Because in turn they tend to lack the tools other champions have, like hard CC and soft CC or  tankiness.

I 100% agree with the point you're trying to make, but:

{{champion:22}} built in soft cc and hard cc ult. Kiting is easy as hell.
{{champion:51}} donuts are hard cc, net is soft cc. Also got a dash, so she's got reliable escape potential.
{{champion:42}} slows, I believe. Also a good escape.
{{champion:119}} His E? I think, has hard CC. Small move-speed steroid, no real reliable escape.
{{champion:81}} no built-in CC, but a good escape.
{{champion:202}} slows, roots. No real escape potential.
{{champion:222}} Slow, snare. No real escape potential.
{{champion:429}} slows, knockup on ult. Decent mobility and escape potential. 
{{champion:21}} slows. Not a lot of escape potential.
{{champion:15}} no built-in CC. Good escape potential depending on how you use spell shield.
{{champion:110}} slow, root. Decent escape potential.
{{champion:67}} knockback. Mobile, invisibility, good escape potential.
{{champion:498}} snare. Plenty of escape potential.

ADCs are just built around autos where most classes are not, does not mean they lack most defensive abilities as a whole. ADCs have some sort of defensive capability innately, not that it's a bad thing. The damage they do on autos is a bit much I believe, but for the most part I agree with you.

And all those champions have some combination of either no tankiness or no mobility, whereas champions like Sej and Zac are both tanky AND have mobility, but in turn, lack sustained damage they do. If they did any less, we would just be back to the tank meta with ADCs being the weakest role in the game again.
The highest winrate hypercarry (or even adc) is Jinx who's at 51.8%. Hypercarries are glass cannons, maybe you should try to kill them before they can output a crazy amount of dps.
Mehn, they spike at 2 items. Can't really prevent that.
I mean focus them, not delay their items.

No

Funny how every person bitching and crying about the balance team says the opposite thing about what they get 'wrong'.

You getting wrecked because you are bad does not mean the game is broken. Get off the cry-train.

Tanks and Assassins can 1v1 ADCs pretty much all game.

Also Most of the members of the balance team do actually play the game. And most of them who do are Plat+
